## Overview

MFÂ² Stack (Move F***ing Fast Stack) is a battle-tested, production-ready starter template that combines the best modern web technologies with zero-config abstractions. Built for founders and developers who want to focus on their product, not infrastructure.

## Tech Stack

- **Next.js 15** - React framework with App Router
- **Convex** - Real-time database and backend
- **Clerk** - Authentication and user management
- **Polar** - Developer-focused payments and subscriptions
- **shadcn/ui** - Beautiful, accessible components
- **Tailwind CSS** - Utility-first styling
- **TypeScript** - Type safety throughout
- **Framer Motion** - Smooth animations
- **Vercel** - Deployment and analytics

## Getting Started

```bash
npx startdown@latest
```

Follow the prompts to set up your project. You'll need accounts with:
- Convex (database)
- Clerk (auth)
- Polar (payments)
- Vercel (hosting)
